trans-unit.source: Add MANIFEST.in. [WouterVH]
trans-unit.target: Add MANIFEST.in. [WouterVH]

trans-unit.source: Add an ILastModified adapter for FSPageTemplate as the FSObject adapter would otherwise take precedence. [stefan]
trans-unit.target: Add an ILastModified adapter for FSPageTemplate as the FSObject adapter would otherwise take precedence. [stefan]

trans-unit.source: Add an option for “anonymous only” caching to the default operations. This is a simple way to switch off caching for logged-in users. See the README for more details. [optilude]
trans-unit.target: Add an option for “anonymous only” caching to the default operations. This is a simple way to switch off caching for logged-in users. See the README for more details. [optilude]

trans-unit.target: Add basic plone.namedfile caching rules, if plone.namedfile is installed [optilude]

trans-unit.source: Code-Style: isort, utf8-headers, zca-decorators, manual cleanup. [jensens]
trans-unit.target: Code-Style: isort, utf8-headers, zca-decorators, manual cleanup. [jensens]

trans-unit.source: Declare
trans-unit.target: Declare

trans-unit.source: Deprecated methods aliases were replaced on tests. [hvelarde]
trans-unit.target: Deprecated methods aliases were replaced on tests. [hvelarde]

trans-unit.source: ETag component in place of the language ETag component in the default configs to allow ETags to be used for anonymous users with caching. [elro]
trans-unit.target: ETag component in place of the language ETag component in the default configs to allow ETags to be used for anonymous users with caching. [elro]

trans-unit.source: Enable unload protection by using pattern class
trans-unit.target: Enable unload protection by using pattern class

trans-unit.target: FieldRefs

trans-unit.source: Fix backslash escapes in i18nstring (poedit complains). [jensens]
trans-unit.target: Fix backslash escapes in i18nstring (poedit complains). [jensens]

trans-unit.source: Fix bug 12038. If transformIterable iterates on the ‘result’ iterable, it must return a new one. [ebrehault]
trans-unit.target: Fix bug 12038. If transformIterable iterates on the ‘result’ iterable, it must return a new one. [ebrehault]

trans-unit.source: Fix bug where resource registries etag is calculated incorrectly if a registry is missing. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Fix bug where resource registries etag is calculated incorrectly if a registry is missing. [davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Fix controlpanel for Python 3 [petschki] (#48)
trans-unit.target: Fix controlpanel for Python 3 [petschki] (#48)

trans-unit.source: Fix documentation to refer to the correct
trans-unit.target: Fix documentation to refer to the correct

trans-unit.source: Fix double purge of paths for items whose default view is the same as /view [eleddy]
trans-unit.target: Fix double purge of paths for items whose default view is the same as /view [eleddy]

trans-unit.source: Fix handling of anon-only flag for cases where maxage is not zero. It was effectively ignored. Added operation test for strong caching. [smcmahon]
trans-unit.target: Fix handling of anon-only flag for cases where maxage is not zero. It was effectively ignored. Added operation test for strong caching. [smcmahon]

trans-unit.source: Fix packaging issue. [esteele]
trans-unit.target: Fix packaging issue. [esteele]

trans-unit.source: Fix possible test failures by logging in with the user name. Note that user id and user name (login name) can differ. [maurits]
trans-unit.target: Fix possible test failures by logging in with the user name. Note that user id and user name (login name) can differ. [maurits]

trans-unit.source: Fix python3 related encoding error on manual purge page. [agitator] (#51)
trans-unit.target: Fix python3 related encoding error on manual purge page. [agitator] (#51)

trans-unit.source: Fix ruleset registry test isolation so that is no longer order dependent. [jone]
trans-unit.target: Fix ruleset registry test isolation so that is no longer order dependent. [jone]

trans-unit.source: Fix tests that fail on the day before the switch to daylight saving time. [pbauer]
trans-unit.target: Fix tests that fail on the day before the switch to daylight saving time. [pbauer]

trans-unit.source: Fix the portalPath used in the controlpanel for manual purging URL’s. This bug resulted in rarely doing all the purging required. [puittenbroek]
trans-unit.target: Fix the portalPath used in the controlpanel for manual purging URL’s. This bug resulted in rarely doing all the purging required. [puittenbroek]

trans-unit.source: Fix: Do not break Plone if there is no Archetypes available. [jensens]
trans-unit.target: Fix: Do not break Plone if there is no Archetypes available. [jensens]

trans-unit.source: Fixed blank edit forms of the per ruleset parameters. Issue 1993. [maurits]
trans-unit.target: Fixed blank edit forms of the per ruleset parameters. Issue 1993. [maurits]

trans-unit.source: Fixed deprecated imports in tests. [thet]
trans-unit.target: Fixed deprecated imports in tests. [thet]

trans-unit.source: Fixed getObjectDefaultView method to strip off leading / and/or @@. [alecghica]
trans-unit.target: Fixed getObjectDefaultView method to strip off leading / and/or @@. [alecghica]

trans-unit.source: Fixed purge paths for virtual hosting scenarios using virtual path components. [dokai]
trans-unit.target: Fixed purge paths for virtual hosting scenarios using virtual path components. [dokai]

trans-unit.source: Fixed tests failing on Zope 2.13 due to the HTTP status no longer being included in the response headers. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Fixed tests failing on Zope 2.13 due to the HTTP status no longer being included in the response headers. [davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Fixed tests when using ZODB 4. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Fixed tests when using ZODB 4. [davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Fixed title and description of max age in strong caching rule for resources. They wrongly were the same as for shared max age. Fixes issue 1989. [maurits]
trans-unit.target: Fixed title and description of max age in strong caching rule for resources. They wrongly were the same as for shared max age. Fixes issue 1989. [maurits]

trans-unit.source: Fixed various i18n issues. [vincentfretin]
trans-unit.target: Fixed various i18n issues. [vincentfretin]

trans-unit.source: Fixes:
trans-unit.target: 수정 사항 :

trans-unit.source: Handle caching of resource registries in RAM cache by not storing empty bodies in the RAMCache [eleddy with major tseaver support]
trans-unit.target: Handle caching of resource registries in RAM cache by not storing empty bodies in the RAMCache [eleddy with major tseaver support]

trans-unit.source: Implement lookup based on portal type class/interface as well as name, and set up defaults for items and folders. [optilude]
trans-unit.target: Implement lookup based on portal type class/interface as well as name, and set up defaults for items and folders. [optilude]

trans-unit.target: Legacy code clean-up Handling of legacy resource registries Products.ResourceRegistries removed [ksuess]

trans-unit.source: Make it possible to set a maxage of zero in strong caching. This is an edge case since this would ordinarily be handled by moderate caching. [smcmahon]
trans-unit.target: Make it possible to set a maxage of zero in strong caching. This is an edge case since this would ordinarily be handled by moderate caching. [smcmahon]

trans-unit.source: Only fire 1 Purge() when deleting content, instead of 3 [skurfer] Detect and ignore content creation more reliably [skurfer] Also purge the parent object when something changes (since the parent probably displays a list that includes the item being changed) [skurfer] (#37)
trans-unit.target: Only fire 1 Purge() when deleting content, instead of 3 [skurfer] Detect and ignore content creation more reliably [skurfer] Also purge the parent object when something changes (since the parent probably displays a list that includes the item being changed) [skurfer] (#37)

trans-unit.source: When there was an error like Unauthorized, 200 status and empty body would be cached in RAMCache instead of not caching anything. This is due to a bug with Zope 2.13 publication events : response.status is not set when IPubBeforeAbort is notified. Fixed by using error_status stored on request by plone.transformchain. [gotcha]
trans-unit.target: When there was an error like Unauthorized, 200 status and empty body would be cached in RAMCache instead of not caching anything. This is due to a bug with Zope 2.13 publication events : response.status is not set when IPubBeforeAbort is notified. Fixed by using error_status stored on request by plone.transformchain. [gotcha]
